Related Character(s): 窪
Связанный символ (и): 窪

漥字的基本解释

漥
wā
古同“洼”。

漥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wā］
［《廣韻》烏瓜切，平麻，影。］
亦作“漥1”。
(1)低陷；凹下。
(2)小水坑。
(3)深。

漥字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　漥； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页646第24
【唐韻】屋瓜切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】烏瓜切，?音窊。【說文】淸水也。一曰窊也。【玉篇】牛蹄跡水也。【老子·道德經】漥則盈。亦同窊。　又【集韻】於佳切，音娃。與窪同。深池也。　又【廣韻】一潁切【集韻】以井切，?音郢。又【集韻】庾頃切，音潁。義?同。

漥字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
漥字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wā］
["Guangyun" Wugua cut, plain hemp, shadow. ]
Also known as "Yu 1".
(1) Depression; depression.
(2) Small puddle.
(3) Deep.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　漥; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 646-24
【Tang Yun】House melon cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Wugua cut,? Sound. [Said the text] Cheongshui also. One said Ya also. [Jade articles] Niu's hoof marks are also water. 【Laozi·Tao Te Jing】Tiao Zeying. Also the same.　[Jiyun] Yu Jiaqie, sound baby. The same with the wa. Deep pond also.　[Guang Yun] One Ying cut [Ji Yun] cut with a well,? Yin Ying. Also 【Jiyun】Yu cuts quickly, and the sound is Ying. Righteous? Same.
